original_text: And I will bring them out from the peoples and gather them from the countries, and will bring them into their own land. And I will feed them on the mountains of Israel, by the ravines, and in all the inhabited places of the country.
korean_text: 내가 그것들을 만민 가운데에서 끌어내며 여러 백성 가운데에서 모아 그 본토로 데리고 가서 이스라엘 산 위에와 시냇가에와 그 땅 모든 거주지에서 먹이되

sentences.original_text: And I will bring them out from the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 민족들 가운데서 인도하여 내고

sentences.original_text: and gather them from the countries
and will bring them into their own land
And I will feed them on the mountains of Israel
and in all the inhabited places of the country
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅의 모든 거주하는 곳에서 먹이리라
